welcome-message: Sooyaal waa madal eey ku kulato bulshada, kaas oo kuu ogolaanaya inaad la wadaagto fikradahaaga dunida. Waxaad sidoo kale akhrin kartaa maqaalada dadka kale.
change-password-message: Gali furahaagii hore halkan iyo ka cusubba, waxaad badali kartaa xili kasto oo aad rabto. kaliya gili furahaagii hore kadib enter taabo si loo xaqiijiyo furaha kadib gali furahaaga cusub.
form.label.name: Magacaaga
